subtitle: Bertrand Russell was once asked how can

when you're a professor of ethics
she said I also am a professor of
mathematics and I'm not a triangle
we can have Brilliant Minds but
emotionally we can be two-year-olds
how do we create a holistic system

between mind and hearts
the way to the heart is through the mind
with your mind you're ready to imagine
things that you are not ready actually
to do when you start dreaming about
ideas and possibilities that are beyond
what you are capable of today
slowly the Mind opens up the possibility

it helps you
create a cognitive life raft
and that opens up the heart to begin to

The Fragile Heart the one that may be
